problem_text_cn: 如图,PA、PB、CD是⊙O的切线,A、B、E是切点,CD分别交线段PA、PB于C、D两点,若∠APB=40°,则∠COD的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, PA, PB, and CD are the tangents of ⊙O, A, B, and E are the tangent points, and CD intersects the line segments PA and PB at C and D respectively. If ∠APB = N_0, then the degree of ∠COD is ( )
raw_answer: 解:由题意得,连接OA、OC、OE、OD、OB,所得图形如下:由切线性质得,OA⊥PA,OB⊥PB,OE⊥CD,DB=DE,AC=CE,∵AO=OE=OB,∴△AOC≌△EOC(SAS),△EOD≌△BOD(SAS),∴∠AOC=∠EOC,∠EOD=∠BOD,∴∠COD=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB,∵∠APB=40°,∴∠AOB=140°,∴∠COD=70°．故选:C．
